After completing the transfer, you will receive your $SHBN tokens within a few hours. Retain these tokens to become eligible for the airdrop.

volume-title: Choose your side & join the volume Battles!
volume-desc: Meet $SHIBOON, where two wacky mates, SHI and BOON, combine the quirks of a Shiba Inu and a Baboon into one wild crypto meme. SHI's obsessed with Solana, BOON's all about Ethereum, and their antics are anything but ordinary. They're championing their favourite blockchains within a single token, but who will reign supreme? Brace yourself as they navigate the memecoin world, battling to propel their token to the top.
story-text1: In the vibrant world of decentralized finance, $HI, the adventurous Shiba Inu, and BOON, the wise baboon, met unexpectedly.
story-text2: $HI chased memes on Solana while BOON explored hidden gems & labyrinthine depths of Ethereum L2. Their encounter led to the discovery of $SHIBOON, sparking a shared passion for crypto.
story-text3: Thus, a legend was born of two unlikely companions navigating the wilds of decentralized finance.

how-to-buy11: Welcome to Shiboon, the world's first dual-character meme coin that brings together the charm of a Shiba Inu (Shi) and a Baboon (Boon).
how-to-buy12: Shi represents the Solana blockchain, while Boon champions the Ethereum blockchain. This unique token combines the best of both worlds into one hilarious and innovative cryptocurrency.
how-to-buy13: Dive into the adventure where these two quirky brothers compete to push their favorite blockchains to the top. With Shiboon, you get the perfect blend of fun and utility, making your crypto journey both entertaining and rewarding.
how-to-buy21: In the Shiboon ecosystem, the battle between Shi and Boon creates an exciting dynamic known as the Volume Wars.
how-to-buy22: When you buy tokens on the Solana chain, you support Shi. Conversely, purchasing tokens on the Ethereum chain means you're backing Boon. This friendly competition between the two sides drives engagement and adds a layer of excitement to your investment.
how-to-buy23: Which side will you choose? The Volume Wars incentivize holders to rally behind their favorite character, pushing for higher volumes and greater rewards. It's not just about holding a token; it's about being part of a thrilling community-driven rivalry.
how-to-buy31: Ready to join the Shiboon revolution? Follow these simple steps to get started:
how-to-buy32: Pick Your Side: Decide whether you want to support Shi on the Solana blockchain or Boon on the Ethereum blockchain.
how-to-buy33: Connect Your Wallet: Ensure you have a suitable wallet for the blockchain you've chosen (e.g., Phantom for Solana or MetaMask for Ethereum).
how-to-buy34: Choose Your Amount: Select the amount of Shiboon tokens you want to purchase.
how-to-buy35: Lean back, subscribe to our email, and enjoy the benefits of Shiboon!

faq1-answer: $SHIBOON is the ultimate mash-up of two iconic characters: $SHI, the impulsive Shiba Inu dog representing the playful nature of the crypto market, and $BOON, the wise yet eccentric baboon symbolizing the experienced investor. Together, they embark on absurd adventures within the crypto world, bringing laughter and entertainment to their followers.
faq2: Shi vs. Boon: Who Are You?
faq2-answer: Are you more like $SHI, the playful and impulsive Shiba Inu, or $BOON, the wise and strategic Baboon? The truth is, we all have a bit of both in us! Some days, you might feel adventurous and ready to take risks like Shi. On other days, you might be calculating and thoughtful like Boon. Embrace your inner duality and enjoy the best of both worlds in the Shiboon community!

faq5-answer: Volume Battles is an epic showdown where $SHI and $BOON compete to see which chain gets the most trading action. It’s a fun rivalry—back your favorite and watch the excitement unfold. Will Shi's playful adventures on Solana win, or will Boon's strategic moves on Ethereum take the crown?
faq6-answer: $SHIBOON takes security seriously, obviously $BOON is in charge. Our smart contracts are audited by top firms, and we’re always on the lookout to keep your tokens safe. You can relax knowing your $SHIBOON is in good hands.
